Package possystem

Class Reservation

java.lang.Object
possystem.Reservation
public class Reservation extends Object
The class represent a reservation made in the Restaurant Reservation Point of Sale System. It contains the details of the reservation - date, time, customer information and reservation status.
Since:
2021-11-12
Version:
1.0
Author:
Chong Hui Yee

  • Constructor Details

    • Reservation

      public Reservation(int id, LocalDateTime dateTime, possystem.Salutation custSalutation, String custName, int custContact, int pax, possystem.Status status, int tableNumber)
      Create a class constructor for the Reservation class
      Parameters:
      id - This Reservation's unique id.
      dateTime - This Reservation's name.
      custSalutation - This Reservation's customer salutation.
      custName - This Reservation's customer name.
      custContact - This Reservation's customer contact.
      pax - The number of seat needed for this reservation.
      status - The status of this reservation.
      tableNumber - The table number reserved for this reservation.
